title-part.text: ACCESSORIES PECULIAR TO CYCLES AND NOT OTHERWISE PROVIDED FOR, e.g. ARTICLE CARRIERS, CYCLE PROTECTORS

note.note-paragraph: In this subclass, the term "cycles" also embraces scooters

title-part.text: Saddles or other seats for cycles

reference.text: arrangements or adaptations of vehicle seats in general B60N

CPC-specific-text.text: Saddles having a seating area with a central cavity or depression
Saddles having a seating area with multiple separate weight bearing surfaces
Saddles with specific anatomical adaptations

title-part.text: Saddles resiliently mounted on the frame

reference.text: springs in general F16F

title-part.text: Saddles capable of swinging about a horizontal pivot
Saddles capable of parallel motion up and down

CPC-specific-text.text: Saddles supported on a parallelogram linkage

title-part.text: Connections between saddle frames and seat pillars

reference.text: attaching seat pillars to cycle frames B62K19/36

title-part.text: Bench-type seats, e.g. dual or twin seats

CPC-specific-text.text: Child seats specially adapted for motorcycles
Child seats attachable to handlebars
Child seats attachable in front of the driver saddle

title-part.text: Covers for saddles or other seats

reference.text: padding in general B68G

title-part.text: Paddings involving torsional or bending springs
Paddings involving other resilient material, e.g. sponge rubber with inflatable compartments
Other additional equipment, e.g. back-rests for children
Signal or lighting devices specially adapted for cycles

reference.text: for vehicles in general B60Q
acoustic signal or alarm devices in general G08

title-part.text: Arrangement of such devices on cycles

note.note-paragraph: Group B62J3/00 is to be understood as restricted to adaptations of signal or lighting devices peculiar to their use on cycles

title-part.text: Arrangement of optical signalling or lighting devices on cycles, the mounting or supporting thereof or circuits therefor

reference.text: optical signalling or lighting devices per se F21,

CPC-specific-text.text: with built-in power supply F21S9/00, G08, H05
Electrical circuits for optical signals or lighting devices

reference.text: Circuit arrangements for charging batteries from dynamo-electric generators driven at varying speed on vehicle H02J7/14

CPC-specific-text.text: using electrical power supply provided by a generator not driven by the cycle motor, e.g. battery
Cycle direction indicators

title-part.text: Arrangement of lighting dynamos or drives therefor

reference.text: dynamo construction H02K
B62J6/12 takes precedence

title-part.text: Dynamos arranged in the wheel hub

CPC-specific-text.text: Lighting devices mounted on whell spokes;
,e.g. on the wheel spokes

reference.text: pedals incorporating reflectors B62M3/12
for vehicles in general B60R

title-part.text: characterised by the arrangement thereof on cycles
above or behind the rear wheel
above the front wheel, e.g. on the handle-bars
Equipment for securing luggage on carriers
Panniers, saddle bags, or other containers specially adapted to be attached to cycles

CPC-specific-text.text: characterised by the location of attachments on cycles

reference.text: B62J9/02 takes precedence

CPC-specific-text.text: above the front wheel, e.g. on the handlebars
between the main frame tubes, e.g. suspended from the cross bar
on the saddle
on the petrol tank

title-part.text: Supporting devices for attaching articles of definite shape to cycles, e.g. for maps, umbrellas, bottles

CPC-specific-text.text: for helmets

reference.text: helmets with anti-theft arrangements A42B3/0413

title-part.text: Fairings or streamlining parts not otherwise provided for

reference.text: guards forming parts of cycle frames B62K; guards in general F16P

title-part.text: Guards for chain, chain drive or equivalent drive, e.g. belt drive
shielding only the upper run of the chain or the like
completely enclosing the chain drive or the like
adtitting ready access to the chain or the like
Fairings or stream-lining parts not otherwise provided for
